Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.elementary

Class InsertionSortComparator<X>

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.generic.SortWithHelper<X>
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.elementary.InsertionSortComparator<X>
Type Parameters:
X - the type of elements to be sorted, which can be compared using a provided comparator.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProcessingSort<X>, Sort<X>, AutoCloseable
public class InsertionSortComparator<X> extends SortWithHelper<X>
A class for performing insertion sort using a comparator, extending functionality from SortWithHelper. This includes methods for initialization and invocation of insertion sort, along with specific utilities like counting inversions.

      public InsertionSortComparator(Helper<X> helper)
      Constructor for InsertionSortComparator, which initializes the comparator with the provided helper.
      Parameters:
      helper - the Helper object to be used for managing the sorting process.

    • InsertionSortComparator

      protected InsertionSortComparator(String description, Comparator<X> comparator, int N, int nRuns, Config config)
      Constructor for any subclasses to use.
      Parameters:
      description - the description.
      comparator - the comparator to use.
      N - the number of elements expected.
      nRuns - the number of runs to be expected (this is only significant when instrumenting).
      config - the configuration.

  • Method Details

    • sort

      public void sort(X[] xs, int from, int to)
      Sort the sub-array xs:from:to using insertion sort.
      Parameters:
      xs - sort the array xs from "from" to "to".
      from - the index of the first element to sort
      to - the index of the first element not to sort

    • sort

      public static <T extends Comparable<T>> void sort(T[] ts)
      Sorts the given array in-place using the provided insertion sort comparator.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the generic type parameter that extends Comparable.
      Parameters:
      ts - the array of elements to be sorted, where elements must implement Comparable. The method modifies this array directly to produce the sorted order.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an IOException occurs during the sorting process.

    • stringSorterCaseInsensitive

      public static Sort<String> stringSorterCaseInsensitive(int n, Config config)
      Creates a case-insensitive string sorter using an insertion sort comparator.
      Parameters:
      n - the expected number of elements to be sorted.
      config - the configuration object containing necessary settings.
      Returns:
      a SortWithHelper<String> instance configured for case-insensitive string sorting.

    • countInversions

      public static <T> long countInversions(T[] ts, Comparator<T> comparator)
      This method is designed to count inversions in quadratic time, using insertion sort.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the underlying type of the elements.
      Parameters:
      ts - an array of comparable T elements.
      Returns:
      the number of inversions in ts, which remains unchanged.
